I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy.
i work in retail.

participant_2.background:
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.
My dream is to travel the world and take pictures of my journey.
I like to take my charges hiking in the Appalachian trail.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.

content.text: I like to go hiking, take pictures of my travels, and get my nails done.
That sounds fun! I like to travel too. I have been all over the world.
Wow! That's amazing. I've only been to a few countries, but I'm hoping to travel more soon.
Where would you like to go?
I'd love to go to Europe and Asia. I've always wanted to see the Eiffel Tower and the Great Wall of China.
Those are both amazing places! I've been to both of them and they're definitely worth seeing.
I'm sure they are! I'm also really interested in seeing the Northern Lights.
The Northern Lights are amazing! I've seen them a few times and they're always breathtaking.
I can't wait to see them! I'm sure they'll be even more beautiful in person.
They definitely are. I hope you get to see them soon.
